results:


for all results:
using 90% train proportion
using thresholds between 0 and 1 in steps of 0.01

I ran the algorithm first using only probsNpGivenSeq[seq] > threshold
and then using probsNgramIsSeq[seq] * probsNpGivenSeq[seq] > threshold

the following lists of results are the different values when increasing the threshold from 0 to 1
in steps of 0.01

first the list of true positive rates, false positive rate, then accuracies.

if you look in the jupyter notebook, towards the end I plotted the curves for TPR, FPR & accuracies
and also printed the best values for each of them.

the actual code runs in lab_3.py


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
